movie.title: School Spirits
movie.description_intro: A girl relocates to a small town only to find it inhabited by ghosts. A struggle against a bad spirit ensues to keep the town's children safe.
movie.description_full: A girl relocates to a small town only to find it inhabited by ghosts. A struggle against a bad spirit ensues to keep the town's children safe.

movies.title: The Inn of the Sixth Happiness
movies.title_english: The Inn of the Sixth Happiness
movies.title_long: The Inn of the Sixth Happiness (1958)
movies.summary: All her life Englishwoman Gladys Aylward knew that China was the place where she belonged. Not qualified to be sent there as a missionary, Gladys works as a domestic to earn the money to send herself to a poor, remote village. There she eventually lives a full and happy life: running the inn, acting as "foot inspector", advising the local Mandarin. and even winning the heart of mixed-race Captain Lin Nan. But Gladys discovers her real destiny when the country is invaded by Japan and the Chinese children need her to save their lives.

But Gladys discovers her real destiny when the country is invaded by Japan and the Chinese children need her to save their lives.

movies.title: Komodo vs. Cobra
movies.summary: Intent on uncovering the shady operations of a top-secret research facility, a small group of environmental activists sets foot on a deserted island in the middle of the Pacific Ocean. There, along with the sole survivor, Dr Susan Richardson, the handful of utterly unprotected visitors will come face-to-face with the devastating results of human ignorance, and enormous, genetically mutated Komodo Dragons and King Cobras. In nature, only the fittest survive. Who will win in the ultimate battle between Komodo and Cobra?

movies.title: Beyond the Law
movies.summary: A former mobster turned businessman and a police detective must contend with a dirty ex-cop looking to bring the killer of his son to justice.
movies.description_full: A former mobster turned businessman and a police detective must contend with a dirty ex-cop looking to bring the killer of his son to justice.
movies.synopsis: A former mobster turned businessman and a police detective must contend with a dirty ex-cop looking to bring the killer of his son to justice.

movies.title: Poem
movies.summary: As a faithful young houseboy fully devotes himself to his spiritual duty, his teacher plans turning over his grandfather's mountain property to realtors for profit.
movies.description_full: As a faithful young houseboy fully devotes himself to his spiritual duty, his teacher plans turning over his grandfather's mountain property to realtors for profit.
